about.summary: Frontend Developer with over 10 years of experience in building high-performance web applications and 5+ years in UI/UX design.

resume.title: Resume
resume.text: Demonstrate my skills, experience, projects and educations

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.subTitle: Conneqt Business Solutions (Adobe)
details: Developed controllers, mappers, and components using *TypeScript* and *Alpine.js* for seamless integration with *AEM* and *GraphQL* APIs. Effective collaboration between front-end, AEM, and architects.
Attended *code quality* sessions to deepen understanding of best practices and optimized performance through strategic problem-solving.
Achieved 95% code coverage with Jest and ensured high-quality code. Conducted accessibility testing with NVIDIA tools for inclusive, user-friendly applications.
Provided mentorship to junior developers, conducted code reviews, and ensured adherence to best practices while maintaining code security using Git Guardian.

experience.title: Lead Frontend Engineer
experience.subTitle: EMIS Health (UK)
details: Enhanced the Extract Builder application for the UK NHS, streamlining data querying and reporting for government submissions.
Generated advanced search features and robust report generation for comprehensive healthcare data analysis.
Managed clinical and ethnicity codes, ensuring accurate and compliant data handling for government reports.
Refined application functionality using the Cohort-builder-kit, Query Manager, and Query Builder Library for seamless integration.

experience.title: Lead Frontend Developer & UI/UX Expert
experience.subTitle: MindPro Technologies Pvt Ltd
details: Delivered 10+ apps, and chatbots using React, Angular, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and SCSS with expertise in Redux, NGRX, and RXJS for state management while managing multiple projects simultaneously.
Integrated REST APIs with front-end applications and documented APIs using Swagger for seamless backend communication and API management.
Led UI/UX design, built 50+ user-centric, responsive interfaces focused on enhancing user experience using Adobe XD, Photoshop, and Illustrator, with select designs showcased on Dribbble.
Ensured code quality through TDD, unit testing with Jest, Jasmin, Karma, and React Testing Library, maintaining good code coverage, and collaborated via GitHub, Bitbucket, and Azure DevOps.
Managed projects using Agile (Scrum) methodologies, collaborating with Inter-Team Cooperation and conducting code reviews to drive performance and ensure best practices.

projects.title: T-Mobile
details: Created dynamic components with TypeScript, Alpine.js, and unified them with AEM via GraphQL and ensured code security with GG Shield.
Utilized Docker for environment management and CRX package manager for handle AEM packages.

projects.title: Extract Builder / Feasibility Service
details: Worked on Query Builder application using React (TypeScript), Redux, and REST API integration.
Constructed features for search creation, allowing doctors to filter datasets based on various criteria

projects.title: Matrix eServices
details: Built insurance eClaim projects using Angular, PrimeNG, NGRX and RXJS.
Build multi repo level components, modal, mock data and Templates, used ADO for agile and CI/CD.

projects.title: Time Tracker
details: Crafted a user-friendly web app for tracking employee activity using React, Redux Tool Kit,TailwindCSS and REST
Solely responsible for managing the entire front-end development.

projects.title: Assistance Chatbot
details: Built a multi-language chatbot with voice recognition and voice playback features using Angular and Synthesized with REST APIs.
Generated chart for leave planner using JavaScript to calculate and display user data, achieving functionality without relying on external libraries.

certification.title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Masterclass
